title: Flux AI â€” AI Tool Review
description: Flux is Black Forest Labs' open-source image generation model that has become the go-to alternative to Midjourney, with exceptional prompt accuracy and photorealism. Flux is a family of open-source image generation models from Black Forest Labs (founded by Stable Diffusion creators). Flux.1 Pro, Dev, and Schnell offer state-of-the-art image generation with superior text rendering, prompt accuracy, and photorealism compared to SDXL. Available via API through Replicate, Together.ai, and directly through fal.ai. Highlights: Open-source models available. Superior text rendering in images. Exceptional photorealism. Multiple model tiers (Pro/Dev/Schnell). Available on multiple platforms.
